title: Database Connection Timeout
impact: Users unable to access their dashboards and reporting features
description: Multiple users are reporting timeouts when accessing their dashboards. Our monitoring systems detected increased response times on the primary database cluster db-prod-01.abnormal.com. The issue appears to be related to connection pool exhaustion.

technical_details.contact_info: For urgent issues, contact ops-team@abnormal.com or call 555-123-4567

timeline.event: Monitoring alerts triggered for database response time
